name: Everbody Wins
description:
Quick, grab a friend!

Rotate the blocks to get the Adorable 3D Mochi into your colourful Sorting Sphincters. The game is done when one player gets to 10 points, but in the end... Everybody Wins!

Careful, once a block is rotated, it can't be rotated again for a little while. Stay one step ahead of your opponent!

Works with two controllers, or a controller and the keyboard.

Features music by the legendary Sos Sosowski.

I think you and your friend are going to have a lot of fun. ❤
